hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #2# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Magic Meter#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #2# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Sun's Song#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly GS Lobby Basement Lower

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Heart Container# and #an Ice Trap#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Water Temple Central Bow Target Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #Deku Stick Capacity#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Sun's Song#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Third Right Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Saria's Song#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #2 Deku Scrubs#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Evil's Bane#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Gerudo Card# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left).text: Did you know that the solution to the Truth Spinner in Shadow Temple is never one of the two positions closest to the initial position?

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs# including an Upgrade one.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Stone of Agony# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Saria's Song#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that beating Bongo Bongo quickly requires an even tempo.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Water Temple Small Key#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Magic Meter#.
